footer.description: Full-stack Web developer based in Moldova

introduction.description: He crafts responsive websites where technologies meet creativity

quote.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand
quote.author: Martin Fowler

description.part_2: I'm a full-stack developer based in Moldova. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
description.part_3: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a two years. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.heading: contacts
contacts.description: I'm interested in exciting projects. However, if you have other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me
